goal: Implement cycle detection algorithms for finding circular dependencies in the knowledge graph
description: Add cycle detection functions to the query module for identifying circular dependencies in the knowledge graph. These functions enable detecting all cycles using DFS-based algorithms and efficiently checking if the graph is acyclic.

contains.name: find_cycles
contains.description: Find all cycles (circular dependencies) in the graph using DFS-based cycle detection algorithm. Returns list of cycles, where each cycle is a list of nodes. Returns empty list if no cycles found.

contains.name: is_acyclic
contains.description: Check if the graph has no cycles. Returns True if acyclic, False if any cycles exist. More efficient than find_cycles when just checking existence.
